marklogic.body: I am not sure we are ready for the alarm system .... a module could be added in some future release and development, but If there was a know problem, the system has capabilities now not available to record a stream and store it Off premise for later review and archiving. I am certain we did not propose enough hard disk to record everywhere 24/7 nor does the education system have enough bandwidth to support this, but if there is a hot Spot, this is easy technology available and ready.
